div.div:
3. Redirect with session token
and Relay public key

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 276px; margin-left: 146px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
5. Submit re-encrypt
request with session token

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 216px; margin-left: 136px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;

div.div:
4. generate private key,
and encrypt key with Relay public key
